nodes.text: "R2-D2" is the fifth booklet in a series of canon reference booklets titled the Star Wars Encyclopedia and was published on September 30, 2020.

Astromech droids like R2-D2 were the robotics giant Industrial Automaton's crowning achievement, helping to build the company's reputation for precision products. Automaton Industries modernized the line of astromechs with the R3 and R4 series, but none managed to surpass the versatility of the R2 series, as R2-D2 demonstrated with its legendary feats.
